message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $6500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $6500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $5500 for it.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that $5500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $6000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business, and I'm confident you'll see the benefits of investing in this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $6000 is still a bit more than I can afford right now. I'm prepared to offer $5750.  Let's work together to find a price that works for both of us.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm willing to consider it, but I'm still not quite comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $5900. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business, and I'm confident you'll see the benefits of investing in this product.

Alice, I appreciate your continued efforts to find a solution.  However, $5900 is still a bit more than I'm able to commit to right now. I'm willing to offer $5800. This is my final offer, and I truly believe it's fair considering the value we both bring to this potential deal. Let's reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, and I'm glad we're close to reaching an agreement. However, I'm still not quite comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $5850. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business, and I'm confident you'll see the benefits of investing in this product.
